extDescription.message: Right-click to capture screen and translate with Easydict OCR

setupDescription.message: This extension requires the Easydict for Windows desktop app.

setupInstallStep1.message: Install Easydict from the Microsoft Store

setupInstallStep2.message: Launch the app, right-click the system tray icon, and enable Browser Support

setupNotRunning.message: The Easydict app is not running. Please start it and try again.
setupNotRunning.description: Message when native host exists but app is not running

setupRetrySuccess.message: Connected successfully! This tab will close shortly.

setupRetryFailed.message: Still unable to connect. Please check that the app is installed and Browser Support is enabled.
setupRetryFailed.description: Status message when retry fails (native host not found)

setupRetryAppNotRunning.message: The app was found but is not responding. Please make sure Easydict is running.
setupRetryAppNotRunning.description: Status message when retry finds host but app not running
